option(ENABLE_OpenraveYarpPaintSquares "Enable/disable OpenraveYarpPaintSquares" ON)

if(ENABLE_OpenraveYarpPaintSquares)

find_package(OpenRAVE REQUIRED)
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(Boost ${OpenRAVE_Boost_VERSION} EXACT COMPONENTS iostreams python thread)

get_property(_common_dirs GLOBAL PROPERTY ROBOTICSLAB_OPENRAVE_YARP_PLUGINS_INCLUDE_DIRS)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                    ${OpenRAVE_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                    ${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                    ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                    ${_common_dirs})

link_directories(${OpenRAVE_LIBRARY_DIRS}
                 ${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

add_library(OpenraveYarpPaintSquares SHARED OpenraveYarpPaintSquares.cpp)

set_target_properties(OpenraveYarpPaintSquares PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "${OpenRAVE_CXX_FLAGS}"
                                                          LINK_FLAGS "${OpenRAVE_LINK_FLAGS}")

target_link_libraries(OpenraveYarpPaintSquares ${YARP_LIBRARIES}
                                               ${OpenRAVE_LIBRARIES})

include(InstallOpenravePlugin)

install_openrave_plugin(OpenraveYarpPaintSquares)

endif()
